tool_description: This API provides a simple interface for retrieving information about GitLab projects. It allows users to specify a GitLab username, group name, and project name, and returns information about the specified project, including its name, description, and other details. The API leverages the GitLab REST API to retrieve the project information, and returns the results in JSON format. The API includes error handling to ensure that users are providing valid inputs, and returns informative error mes...
title: Gitlab Project Viewer API

api_list.name: projects
